description.value:
The Stag King [CG]

The worship of The Stag King seems to predate even the founding of the Kingdom of Chatillon from which most of his adherents come. An ancient and primordial deity of the deep forests that once covered vast tracks of that part of the world, The Stag King is a creator and protector of wild beasts and holdout wilderness areas. He has very few dedicated Priests and even fewer champions; followers of The Stag King tend to be hunters, trappers, or other hardy forest-folk.


Edicts hunt only for food; leave no quarry dishonored upon the field, respect the ancient forests, heed your dreams.
Anathemas sport hunting, uncontrolled deforestation, disrespect towards fallen beasts.
Follower Alignments NG, CG, CN

Devotee Benefits

Divine Font healing

Divine Skill Survival

Favored Weapon longbow

Domains creation, dreams, nature

Cleric Spells 1st: summon plant or fungus, 3rd: animal vision, 6th: tangling creepers
